name: audacity
description: [Audacity]({{ project_url }}) is an easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder. Developed by a group of volunteers as open source.

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

volumes.description: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings and images

readme-vars.project_blurb: [Audacity]({{ project_url }}) is an easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder. Developed by a group of volunteers as open source.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

param_volumes.desc: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings and images

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
The application can be accessed at:

* http://yourhost:3000/

By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:

* http://yourhost:3000/?login=true

changelogs.desc: Use the official appimage, switch to single arch (x86_64). Armhf and aarch64 users can remain on version 3.0.2 but there won't be further updates.

setup:
The application can be accessed at:

* http://yourhost:3000/

By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:

* http://yourhost:3000/?login=true
title: Audacity
